oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Cajun Joe (The Bully Of The Bayou) - Rusty And Doug Kershaw performance - 1961-12-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Cajun Joe (The Bully Of The Bayou), written by Rusty Kershaw and Doug Kershaw, produced by Wesley Rose, recorded at the RCA Victor Studio in Nashville, Tenn. on December 19, 1961, and performed by Rusty and Doug Kershaw (vocals), Chet Atkins (guitar), Harold Bradley (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Lightning Chance (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), and Floyd Cramer (piano). Most likely commercial recording (Hickory 45-1177).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rusty Kershaw; Doug Kershaw; Rusty and Doug Kershaw
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Rusty and Doug Kershaw perform "Cajun Joe (The Bully Of The Bayou)"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Two copies of "Cajun Joe" sheet music [typed] stored with transcription documents, Box 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Acuff-Rose Publications; Kershaw, Doug; Kershaw, Rusty; Rose, Wesley; Atkins, Chet, 1924-2001; Bradley, Harold (Guitarist); Edenton, Ray; Chance, Floyd "Lightnin'"; Harman, Buddy; Cramer, Floyd, 1933-1997; RCA Studio B
